pages.text: 70|11|taderake kara habe eke aparera drstigocara. Aparadhi sedinera sastira badale dite ca'ibe tara santana-santatike
70|12|ara tara stri o bha'ike
70|13|ara tara jnati-gosthike, yara take asraya dita
70|14|ara yamine yara ache tadera saba'ike, tarapara yate eti take mukti deya.
70|15|Kakhana'i naya, niscaya eta lelihana aguna
70|16|ya mathara camara khasiye debe [1].
70|17|Jahannama se byaktike dakabe, ye satyera prati pitha dekhiyechila ebam mukha phiriye niyechila.
70|18|Ara ye sampada punjibhuta karechila atahpara sanraksita kare rekhechila [1].
70|19|Niscaya manusake srsti kara hayeche atisaya asthiracittarupe [1].
70|20|Yakhana bipada take sparsa kare se haya ha-hutasakari.
70|21|Ara yakhana kalyana take sparsa kare se haya ati krpana
70|22|tabe salata adayakarigana chara [1]
70|23|yara tadera salate sarbada pratisthita [1]
70|24|ara yadera sampade nirdharita haka rayeche
70|25|yacnakari o bancitera
70|26|ara yara pratidana dibasake satya bale bisbasa kare.
70|27|Ara yara tadera rabera sasti samparke bhita-santrasta
70|28|niscaya tadera rabera sasti hate nihsanka thaka yaya na
70|29|ara yara nijedera yaunangasamuhera hiphayatakari [1]
70|30|tadera patni athaba adhikarabhukta dasi chara, ete tara nindaniya habe naâ€”
70|31|tabe ke'u ederake chara an'yake kamana karale tara habe simalanghanakari
70|32|ara yara tadera amanata'o pratisruti raksakari [1]
70|33|ara yara tadera saksyasamuhe atala [1]
70|34|ara yara tadera salatera hiphayata kare ---[1]
70|35|tara'i sam'manita habe jannatasamuhe.
70|36|Kaphiradera hala ki ye, tara apanara dike chute asache
70|37|dana o bama dika theke, dale dale.
70|38|Tadera pratyeke ki e pratyasa kare ye, take prabesa karano habe pracuryamaya jannate
70|39|kakhano naya [1], amara taderake ya theke srsti karechi ta tara jane [2].
